venue.address_1: entrance to parking lot is at intersection of Robbins St and Crescent St
venue.name: Waltham Watch Factory parking lot, Crescent St, Waltham, MA

item.description: This walk follows a path(mostly) along the Charles heading towards the Auburndale part of Newton. It's an easy walk, and will be about 3 miles. There is plenty of parking at the Watch Factory.  The path begins at the left side of the parking lot (as you enter).
item.name: Waltham to Auburndale along the Charles(most of the way)
